tweet: His inflammatory and distorted rhetoric demonstrates a total disregard for the citizens, institutions, elected officials, and democratic foundations of this country. The only thing inciting division is the President himself – which he is doing for his own political gain.
The President’s use of a legitimate legal process as a partisan tool to fearmonger and sow division in this country is completely unconscionable.

The impeachment process is a constitutional duty given to Congress by the founding fathers to conduct oversight and serve as a check on the other branches of government. It is a duty that is undertaken only with the utmost gravity and serious consideration.
L’shanah Tovah and happy new year to everyone in the 8th District and across the country celebrating Rosh Hashanah. Wishing everyone health and prosperity this year.

I am proud to be a cosponsor of H.Res. 565, which honors National Clean Energy Week. Working towards clean energy is an important issue to me and will help keep the 8th District efficient and safe.

Clean energy is helping to shape the future of America’s economy. This week is Clean Energy Week, and it is important to think about how a shift to clean energy will positively impact our economy & environment, leaving a cleaner, more efficient world for our children.

Now that Congress is back from August recess, it is beyond time for @SenateMajLdr McConnell to bring forward commonsense gun reforms like #HR8 that will save American lives. We can no longer stand by while innocent people continue to die in mass shootings.

H.R. 1420 encourages the adoption of energy-efficient information technologies across all federal agencies. These bills are important steps in the right direction to keeping our air clean and our planet healthy

H.R. 1768 would reauthorize the DERA program which gives financial assistance to people or organizations that want to replace old dirty diesel engines (in trucks or school buses or tractors) with new clean ones. These are concrete steps we can take to keep our air clean.
Tonight, the House will be voting on two bills – H.R. 1768, the Diesel Emissions Reduction Act (DERA) of 2019, and H.R. 1420, the Energy Efficient Government Technology Act.

September is National Cholesterol Education Month. Over 102 million Americans have cholesterol above healthy levels, posing a greater risk of a heart attack or stroke. Check your cholesterol regularly & know what your cholesterol levels mean. More info:  https://bit.ly/2ozTQLS

As my Democratic colleagues and I continue to fight to #ProtectTheDream in Congress all DACA recipients should keep their status up to date: https://bit.ly/2mCabwI
#HR6 would help to create a pathway to citizenship for #Dreamers and TPS recipients. #DACA recipients are our friends, colleagues, and neighbors, and should be treated as such.

Two years ago, the Administration recklessly ended DACA, leaving hundreds of thousands with an uncertain future. In response, I was proud to be an original cosponsor of #HR6, the American Dream and Promise Act of 2019.

For over 7 years, #DACA has helped to protect the over 800,000 young people across the country from deportation as they pursue the American dream. Unfortunately, @realDonaldTrump continues to try and dismantle DACA and close off the U.S. to immigrants.

Like so many communities across the U.S., the 8th District is home to #DACA recipients. The over 4,000 DACA recipients contribute over $300 million to our local GDP and help make up our vibrant and diverse community.

September is National Childhood Obesity Awareness Month. 1 in 5 children face a lifetime of negative health complications stemming from obesity related issues. This month learn more about healthy eating and living to #PromoteHealthyGrowth at:  https://bit.ly/2skWNSC

It is appalling to hear news that the House passed bill, #HR8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act, could have prevented the shooter in Odessa, Texas from privately obtaining firearms. I voted in favor of this legislation and urge @Senatemajldr to bring it forward in the Senate.

Maduro’s planned military exercises along the #Colombian border are part of his continuing effort to increase tensions and destabilize the region. While #Venezuelans suffer, Maduro promotes baseless conspiracy theories to distract from his government’s plunder of state resources.

It is beyond frustrating to watch these events occur without any concrete action to prevent them. I call on @Senatemajldr to bring House passed gun control legislation to the Senate floor for a vote. The safety of the American people is our primary duty!

My heartfelt condolences go out to the friends and family impacted by the senseless atrocity committed in Odessa, Texas this weekend. 53 people were killed by firearms in mass shootings during August. 1 person killed by senseless violence is too many & 53 is simply heartbreaking.

Hurricane Dorian’s devastation of the Bahamas is a historic tragedy. We pray for the Bahamas and all affected by the hurricane. Many will need help recovering, and we stand ready. As storms are growing stronger and larger due to climate change, it is our responsibility to act.
The New Jersey Department of Health will be receiving over $7 million in CDC funds to help address the opioid epidemic. My statement: https://bit.ly/2lsbvol

The labor movement in this country secured the fourty-hour workweek, weekends, overtime pay, and many more protections for American workers. This #LaborDay let’s remember to honor the pioneers who secured them – and work to protect these gains.
